H0.text: where is wind power used most in the united states. Texas

H1.text: where is wind power used most in the united states. California

H2.text: where is wind power used most in the united states. Oklahoma

H3.text: where is wind power used most in the united states. Iowa

A4.text: Texas, with 39,450 MW of capacity generating about 25% of the state's total electricity in 2024, has had the most installed wind power capacity of any U.S. state for more than a decade.

A5.text: The state generating the highest percentage of energy from wind power is Iowa, at over 57% of total energy production.

A6.text: The state is a leader in renewable energy commercialization; it produces the most wind power in the nation.
